sentences.en: A major barrier to interspecific hybridization is sterility in the F 1 progeny.
sentences.cn: 种间杂交的主要障碍是F1代的不育性.

sentences.en: A scummy sterility hanging over the town, a fog of book - learning.
sentences.cn: 这座城镇笼罩在一种卑下的贫乏和啃书本的浓雾中,学的全是以往的渣滓.

sentences.en: A temperature of 121� � C is regarded as the minimum necessary to achieve sterility.
sentences.cn: 一般认为要做到无菌,温度起码必须达到121摄氏度.

sentences.en: All are the major causes of ovulatory dysfunetional sterility.
sentences.cn: 以上均为排卵功能障碍性不孕的主要病机.

sentences.en: Conclusion The sterility test reassured by verification test is feasible and reliable.
sentences.cn: 方法采用直接接种法,通过无菌验证试验确定无菌检查方法的有效性.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The established sterility test method for Imipenem monohydrate may be practical.
sentences.cn: 结论: 建立的亚胺培南一水合物无菌检查法可供实用.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The sterility test reassured by validation test is feasible and reliable.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用薄膜过滤法,通过无菌验证试验确定无菌检查方法的有效性.

sentences.en: Different male sterility types were among the three lilies.
sentences.cn: 不同基因型的百合产生雄性不育变异类型有差异.

sentences.en: It has been known that the self - sterility of conifers results from embryo collapse after self - fertilization.
sentences.cn: 业已知道,针叶树自花不育是由于自花受精后胚凋萎.

sentences.en: Sterility is some permanent factor preventing procreation.
sentences.cn: 不育是阻碍生殖的一种永久性因素.

sentences.en: The phenomenon of female sterility is common in plant.
sentences.cn: 雌性不育现象在植物界内普遍存在着.

sentences.en: The phenomenon of genic male sterility ( GMS ) occurs widely in plant.
sentences.cn: 植物核雄性不育现象广泛存在于自然界中.

sentences.en: These are obvious implications for the design of other methods of producing male sterility.
sentences.cn: 这些显然对设计产生雄性不育的新方法都有启发.

sentences.en: This disease causes sterility in both males and females.
sentences.cn: 该病会导致男女不孕不育。

sentences.en: This paper reviews the advancement of mechanism of plant cytoplasmic male sterility.
sentences.cn: 本文综述了植物细胞质雄性不育分子机理的研究进展.

trans.tran_cn: 不毛，不孕，内容贫乏，不结果实
